fileUpload.fileLimitErrorText: You have reached the limit of the number of possible attached files
fileUpload.fileSizeLimitErrorText: The uploaded file exceeded the limit of uploading allowed size

header.title: Welcome to Artograd
header.subtitle:
The largest community of creators and city residents.
Be the one who changes the world around.

steps.stepDescription1: State officers open tenders for street art projects in their jurisdictions by publishing them on the Artograd platform.
steps.stepDescription2: Artograd notifies state officers' media contacts about the open tender, asking them to invite creative people to submit their proposals. Creative individuals submit renderings of their ideas along with an approximate cost estimate for implementation.
steps.stepLinkText2: Explore Tenders in the Ideation Phase
steps.stepDescription3: After the proposal submission period ends, the voting period begins. Any signed-in user can vote for their favorite proposal. After the voting period, the tender owner selects the final winner from the top 3 most liked proposals.
steps.stepDescription4: Once the winner is chosen, fundraising starts by publishing bank payment details on the Artograd platform and asking the media to promote sponsorship. When the funds are received, the state officer transfers them to the winner to implement their idea. The winner reports the progress on the Artograd platform so everyone can see how the funds are being used.
steps.stepDescription5: Once completed, the art object is opened and tagged with a QR code linking to its Artograd page for more details.

profilePage.Show my email as means of contact in the: Show my email as means of contact in the tender description.
profilePage.Add links to your portfolio to help peop: Add links to your portfolio to help people know your work profile better.
profilePage.This information is required to start ar: This information is required to start art objects fundraising when winning proposal is chosen and tender is closed.
profilePage.Use this bank data by default for each t: Use this bank data by default for each tender fundraising.
profilePage.If you delete account, your personal inf: If you delete account, your personal information and all your activity will be eliminated from the servers.
profilePage.When you delete account, all created ten: When you delete account, all created tenders and related proposals will be permanently removed.
profilePage.Upload an image as you would like to rep: Upload an image as you would like to represent you identity and appear in your Artograd profile
profilePage.Supported formats JPG, GIF, or PNG. Maxi: Supported formats JPG, GIF, or PNG. Maximum size 1 MB.
profilePage.Please fill in the required fields for f: Please fill in the required fields for further usage of application:
profilePage.Image format is incorrect. Valid formats: Image format is incorrect. Valid formats - JPG, GIF, or PNG
profilePage.Image size is too big. Please upload pho: Image size is too big. Please upload photo for up to 1 MB
profilePage.If you win the tender the following bank: If you win the tender the following bank account will receive funds for idea implementation.
profilePage.Invalid phone number. Number has to star: Invalid phone number. Number has to start from + and contain at least 5 digits

tenders.tendersDescription: Creating a tender, you announce open calls for street art, invite sculptors, artists, and creators to enhance the cityscape.

tenderCard.tenderDeleteMessage: When you confirm ‘Delete’ action, the tender will be permanently removed and not available in the tenders list.
